snippet: Muslim students visiting an Oklahoma lawmaker's office in the state capitol were required to fill out a form that asked if they beat their wives and other questions that offended them, an Islamic advocacy group said....

headline.main: Town Grieving After Mother, 4 Children Die in House Fire
headline.print_headline: Town Grieving After Mother, 4 Children Die in House Fire

lead_paragraph: Muslim students visiting an Oklahoma lawmaker's office in the state capitol were required to fill out a form that asked if they beat their wives and other questions that offended them, an Islamic advocacy group said.
